title: Ctrl Z
body:
_Sejuani_

Just putting it out there... As an option...

Ya'know... for when you've make a mistake...

replies.body: Agreed, but fizz needs 2, that would put lee and fizz non existent how every one wants, and yasuo back to his original state of turret blocking, mass base damage on e and a useful shield size and length, along with a 25% charge every dash.

Quinn and Valor.

Just saying.

The option is there.
